legal_basis.deadline_description_en: Must be submitted within 14 days of moving in
legal_basis.penalty_en: Fine of up to ¥50,000 for failure to register
legal_basis.cost_note_en: Free. Certificate of Residence (住民票) afterwards costs ¥300.

sections.note_en: Fill out one row per household member being registered

documents_required.ja: 婚姻証明書 + 日本語訳
出生証明書 + 日本語訳

from_another_municipality.title_ja: 他市区町村からの転入

documents_required.en: My Number Card (all who have one)

within_municipality.title_ja: 同一市区町村内の転居

counter_phrases.ja: すみません、住民登録の窓口はどこですか？
counter_phrases.romaji: Sumimasen, jūmin tōroku no madoguchi wa doko desu ka?
counter_phrases.en: Excuse me, where is the resident registration counter?

counter_phrases.ja: 転入届を出したいのですが
counter_phrases.romaji: Tennyu todoke wo dashitai no desu ga
counter_phrases.en: I'd like to submit a moving-in notification

counter_phrases.ja: 海外から初めて転入します
counter_phrases.en: I'm registering for the first time from abroad

counter_phrases.ja: 英語の用紙はありますか？
counter_phrases.romaji: Eigo no yōshi wa arimasu ka?
counter_phrases.en: Do you have an English version of the form?

counter_phrases.ja: 記入方法を教えていただけますか？
counter_phrases.romaji: Kinyū hōhō wo oshiete itadakemasu ka?
counter_phrases.en: Could you help me fill this out?

counter_phrases.ja: 住民票もお願いしたいのですが
counter_phrases.romaji: Jūminhyō mo onegai shitai no desu ga
counter_phrases.en: I'd also like a Certificate of Residence, please

counter_phrases.ja: マイナンバーはいつ届きますか？
counter_phrases.en: When will my My Number arrive?

after_submission.ja: 在留カードに新住所が記載されます
after_submission.en: Your new address is printed on the back of your Residence Card (10-30 min wait)

after_submission.ja: マイナンバー通知が届きます
after_submission.en: My Number notification card mailed to your address (2-3 weeks, first-time only)
Enrolled in National Health Insurance (if not employer-provided) — same counter or nearby
Can request Certificate of Residence (住民票) immediately — ¥300, needed for bank/phone/lease

common_mistakes.mistake_en: Writing name in romaji instead of katakana
common_mistakes.fix_en: Most forms want katakana (カタカナ). Ask staff for help converting your name.

common_mistakes.mistake_en: Using arrival date instead of move-in date
common_mistakes.fix_en: 異動日 is when you moved into your apartment, not when your flight landed.

common_mistakes.mistake_en: Leaving head of household (世帯主) blank
common_mistakes.fix_en: If you live alone, you ARE the head of household. Write your own name.
Marriage/birth certificates need a Japanese translation with the translator's name stated. A friend can do it — no certified translator required.

common_mistakes.mistake_en: Not bringing all household members' Residence Cards
common_mistakes.fix_en: You need every person's Zairyu Card, including children.
